participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and enthusiastic, she finds joy in both her family life and her creative pursuits.
participant_1.background: I love eating at the local sports bar with my son after his games. I'm proud of being able to juggle my blog and being a mom of five. I enjoy a coke with my burger. My father is a wildlife veterinarian and my mother is an animal rights activist. The weather is irrelevant to me

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Creative and caring, he balances his career and family life while pursuing his passion for writing.
participant_2.background: I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets. I love bananas because they're sweet and portable. I'm a software engineer, but my passion is writing. I have male pattern baldness. I spend my days caring for my children, coding, and designing.

content.text: How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! How about yourself?
I'm doing great! I love spending time with my family.
I do too! I have five kids and they keep me on my toes.
That's a lot of kids! What do they like to do?
They love to play sports, go to the park, and read books.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love reading books too.
I'm a software engineer, but my passion is writing. I'm glad you enjoy reading!
I do! I like to write too, but I'm not very good at it.
You should keep practicing! I'm sure you'll get better.
Thanks! I will try!
What are your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different kinds of books, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
That's my favorite genre too! What are some of your favorite historical fiction books?
I recently read The Nightingale by Kristin Hannah and it was amazing. I also love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon.
I've heard good things about The Nightingale! I'll have to check it out. I love the Outlander series too. It's so good!
It is! I can't wait for the next book to come out.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common. We should talk about books more sometime!
That sounds great! I'd love to.
Great! I'll add you on Facebook so we can stay in touch.
Sounds good
